General.Name: Prime Dividend Corp
General.Description: Prime Dividend Corp. is an open ended equity mutual fund launched by Quadravest Inc. The fund is managed by Quadravest Capital Management Inc. It invests in public equity markets of Canada. The fund invests in stocks of companies across diversified sectors. Prime Dividend Corp. was formed on November 16, 2005 and is domiciled in Canada.
General.Address: 77 King Street West, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5K 1K7
